column5: I had a trip planned but did not think it would happen so now I do not have all the money for that trip or the vacation days now. However, I can still afford about 700.00 for a trip. Could only do about 4-5 days though. Would like to do it the next few weeks as well. I love the red lake area. Need to rent a boat. I am a solo usually. I cook for myself. I fish for walleyes and that is what I target. Any thoughts???? Thank you.
Could you possibly get someone else to go, and split the cost ?

[QUOTE=Walleye2242;6585074]I had a trip planned but did not think it would happen so now I do not have all the money for that trip or the vacation days now. However, I can still afford about 700.00 for a trip. Could only do about 4-5 days though. Would like to do it the next few weeks as well. I love the red lake area. Need to rent a boat. I am a solo usually. I cook for myself. I fish for walleyes and that is what I target. Any thoughts???? Most camps are around 6-700 A week.
Little Turtle Lodge in Mine Centre might fit your needs. Cost, close and nice quiet place.
